title: HackTheBox - Mirai
tags: htb-linux-easy, mirai, pi-hole, raspberry, default credentials, file recovery, writeup, oscp-prep
snippet: Mirai is one of the first significant botnets targeting exposed networking devices running Linux. Found in August 2016 by MalwareMustDie, its name means “future” in Japanese. Nowadays it targets a wide range of networked embedded devices such as IP cameras, home routers (many vendors involved),...
